source: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_SEQ_00<tab>Kuzai Tazai wants your help with some crustacean issues.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_SEQ_00<tab>コスタ・デル・ソルのクザイ・タザイは、まだまだ困りごとがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_SEQ_01<tab>Recent tremors off the shore of Costa del Sol have caused a troublesome influx of snippers. If that were not bad enough, Kuzai Tazai has informed you that the group is led by an even more fearsome creature. Providing you with a concoction that might be used to debilitate the larger foe, the Lalafell has bid you slay five of the snippers so that you might lure him out.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_SEQ_01<tab>地震の影響で、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2023001 /var>が陸に上がってくるらしい。まずは「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2023001 /var>」を5匹倒そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_SEQ_02<tab>You have dispatched five snippers, which should serve to provoke the gripper. Lie in wait at the specified location, and ambush the crab with your alchemic concoction when it appears.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2023001 /var>を倒した。はたして、大ガニは現れるのだろうか……。「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8C8401 /var>」で待機し、現れた魔物を倒そう。魔物には「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87BE01 /var>」が有効らしい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_SEQ_03<tab>You have heroically slain the formidable gripper, making the shores safer for the time being. Report back to Kuzai Tazai.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207CB01 /var>を倒した。コスタ・デル・ソルのクザイ・タザイに報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_SEQ_04<tab>As before, Kuzai Tazai seems gladdened by your achievement, but remains reserved about the situation. There are rumors afloat that the seaside quakes are being caused by an unknown monster.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_SEQ_04<tab>カニが陸に上がってくる原因であった地震は、魔物に起因しているという。いったいそれは、どんな魔物なのだろうか……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_TODO_01<tab>Lie in wait and defeat the gripper with the alchemic concoction.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8C8401 /var>で待機し<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87BE01 /var>を使って魔物を討伐

source: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_KUZAITAZAI_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 08 E905 ((ma'am)) ((sir)) /var>. I didn't catch your name before. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Nice to meet you! Even <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> so because I could use your help once again. It's those quakes that started up a little while ago. The tremors have been sending snippers up out of the water.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_KUZAITAZAI_000_000冒険者さんに、またお願いがあります……。
最近、地震が増えてるんですが、そのたびに危険を察知して、
「」が陸にあがってくるんです。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_KUZAITAZAI_000_001<tab>They're bloody dangerous things to get rid of by themselves, but there's a gnarled old gripper to tackle into the bargain. Took a toe off the salter's boy not three days past. <sigh> We know how to best it, but we can't get close enough.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_KUZAITAZAI_000_001しかも、を退治しようとすると、
奴らの親分みたいな大ガニが現れて大暴れするもんで、
まったく始末におえません！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_KUZAITAZAI_000_002<tab>But that's where you come in. Master Gegeruju had an alchemic concoction made that should be able to soften the old gripper's shell.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_KUZAITAZAI_000_002この「」を渡しておきますね。
なんでも硬い甲羅を柔らかくする薬だとかで……
ゲゲルジュ様が、急いで作らせたものなんです。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_KUZAITAZAI_000_003<tab>Here, take it. It'll be your job to survive the ill-tempered wavekin's swipes long enough to make sure it gets several dousings. You already took care of those kobolds─surely, <var 1A 02 /var>these<var 1A 01 /var> shouldn't pose any challenge!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_KUZAITAZAI_000_003どうぞ、大ガニを退治するときに使ってください。
腕の立つ冒険者さんにしか、お願いできないんです！
どうか、よろしくお願いします！

TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_DUMMY_000_020（現れた「不審な地点」で待機→特殊スニッパーがPOP
　バトルアイテムを使って防御力を下げる→倒す）

source: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_KUZAITAZAI_000_030<tab>That was most quick! You are a credit to all adventurers, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_KUZAITAZAI_000_030お帰りなさい！
こんなに早く解決しちゃうだなんて、さすがですね！
ありがとうございました。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_KUZAITAZAI_000_031<tab>You know, I've heard talk of late about what's been causing those tremors. Folk seem certain it's the work of some monster. I know from experience that such words are oft naught but wind, but I can't help but wonder...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB203_00834_KUZAITAZAI_000_031ところで、これはタダの噂なんですが……
そもそもの地震の原因も、なんと魔物なんですって。
どんな魔物の仕業か知りませんが……不安ですよね。
